entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
